main.name: Raden Achmad Zildhan Frans Bestand
main.description: I'm a undergraduate student at UIN Jakarta majoring Information System. I'm passionate and interested on web development, data science, and mobile application development. I also fluent in English, Japanese, and Mandarin.
main.bio: Hi there! Let me introduce myself, my name is Raden Achmad Zildhan Frans Bestand and you can call me Zildhan. I'm an undergraduate student at UIN Jakarta majoring Information Systems. Basically, I am a newbie in any kind of development, but for real I really passionate and want to learn more.
main.contactmessage: Hi! You can contact me by this following sites. Let's get connected and contribute each other!

resume.skillmessage: I'm passionate in web developing using HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, and Boostrap. I am also passionate in data analyst and data visualization using Tableau, Phyton, PHP, MySQL, and Excel.

education.school: Islamic State University of Syarif Hidayatullah Jakarta
education.description: I'm active on joining several IT competition, having experiences as a volunteer such as Bangkit Academy and Goto by Gojek, and I'm also a participant in university's organization.
I'm joining math, physic, biology, and chemistry national olympiad.
